title: Road Redemption v0.002 (2-click run)
description:

You can even run this torrent from an USB-Stick.

These are a few things that makes a 'Easy Run' version a better version.

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

DESCRIPTION:
Redemption Road - the spiritual successor of Road Rash. Is currently in alpha testing and looks promising. protagonist of the game will be released to freedom biker who for the time spent in jail, managed to lose all credibility. Now he has to earn the respect from scratch his gang, taking part in the crazy race for survival. Of course, the story in the spirit of GTA is just a pretext to have fun - namely, beating opponents with baseball bats at a speed of 200 km / h In-Game Road Redemption developers have promised to create a motorcycle racing without rules. Team Dark Seas Games working on modern graphics quality, an extensive list of weapon system of choice of different ways, and many others. Redemption Road is ready for the PC, Mac and Linux in August 2014. The creators also promised to release a port for Wii U and Xbox 360.

Installation instructions:
1. Execute the .exe file.
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Enjoy the program.
